title: Logging in takes forever
body:
My logging in takes forever(approx. 3 mins) and when I finally log in, I can't open my Loot tab and I can't click PLAY to play a game, it says to restart but it doesn't help?

Best Regards, Katarina OTP.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.

I wouldn't say it's a DNS problem but it sounds like @Katarina OTP needs to repair client. If that does not work, try to run the client as administrator. If that does not work, then please  disable fullscreen optimize as this function is still in beta for Windows.
